description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Explore the world of Aeski, try to escape a locked room or be accepted to the School for Gifted Demons in Adventures in Text, three short multiple choice text adventures.  Play with friends by co-operating and agreeing your answers. Fail to agree and the game decides your path! Also includes three quizzes/
